import './style.css' import * as React from "react"; import Images from '../../assets/book.jpg' import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Main from "../../components/Main"; import Container from "../../components/Container"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import api from '../../services/api'; export default function RegisterBks () { const [books, setBooks] = React.useState([]) const [input, setInput] = React.useState({ title: '', image: '', description: '' }) const getBooks = async () => { const response = await api.get('/books') setBooks(response.data) console.log(response.data) } React.useEffect(() => { getBooks() },[]) const handleChange = (e) => { setInput ({ ...input, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() await api.post('/books', { title: input.title, textarea: input.textarea }) setInput('') await getBooks() } return(
